channel.title: I need serious help
channel.description:
i just made a server named crackascape.no-ip.org
but i can not figure how how to make my self owner
i will gove who ever helps me a mod if i can figure out how
so can some1 plz help me

item.title: I need serious help
item.dc:creator: @Hootnnuts Hootnnuts
item.description:
@Hootnnuts wrote:

go to client.jaa and search for

if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("

then where it says

if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("NAME")) { playerRights = #; }

change NAME to your name and # to 1 2 or 3

1= pmod
2= admin
3= owner

Remember!!!
if u use 3 you will not be able to see your own crown

Read full topic

item.title: I need serious help
item.dc:creator: @n0vamage n0vamage
item.description:
@n0vamage wrote:

u also need to open up character file find ur name open it and look for this

[CHARACTER] character-height = 0 character-posx = 3209 character-posy = 3429 character-rights = 2 character-ismember = 1 character-messages = 0 character-lastconnection = localhost character-lastlogin = 20060101 character-energy = 100 character-gametime = 0 character-gamecount = 30468 where it sayscharacter-rights = 2 u need to change that 1 mod 2 admin 3 owner

Read full topic

item.title: I need serious help
item.dc:creator: @Billys_Java Billys Java
item.description:
@Billys_Java wrote:

[code] //start of moderator/admin list, 1 = mod, 2 = staff, 3 = admin
if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“ii owned uu”))
{
playerRights = 3;
}

else if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“ii owned uu”))
{
playerRights = 3;
}

else if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“ii owned uu”))
{
playerRights = 2;
}
else if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“roooony”))
{
playerRights = 2;
}[/code]

now replace the names with the names of who you want to be admins and there you go. Where it says playerrights = 3 that is for server owner and where it says playerrights = 2 that is for a server admin

Read full topic

item.title: I need serious help
item.dc:creator: @pur3str_pk2 pur3str pk2
item.description:
@pur3str_pk2 wrote:

[quote=“dem hataz, post:1, topic:36441”]i just made a server named crackascape.no-ip.org

but i can not figure how how to make my self owner

i will gove who ever helps me a mod if i can figure out how

so can some1 plz help me[/quote]
Oke, open up your Client.java. Search for Admin list. there you see this:
//start of moderator/admin list, 1 = mod, 2 = staff, 3 = admin
if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“a name”))
{
playerRights = 3;
}

else if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“a name”))
{
playerRights = 3;
}

else if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“a name”))
{
playerRights = 2;
}
else if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“a name”))
{
playerRights = 2;
}

There, where it says a name put your name, playerright = 2 means you’re an admin. and playerRight = 3 means you owner, but u can’t see your crown.
Put your name by playerRight 2 if youu want to be an admin with golden crown, and by 3 if you want no crown. [br][size=1]Posted at: 21:20:27,December 17, 2006[/size][hr]code: [i] //start of moderator/admin list, 1 = mod, 2 = staff, 3 = admin
if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“ii owned uu”))
{
playerRights = 3;
}

else if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“ii owned uu”))
{
playerRights = 3;
}

else if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“ii owned uu”))
{
playerRights = 2;
}
else if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“roooony”))
{
playerRights = 2;
}[/i][br][size=1]Posted at: 21:22:21,December 17, 2006[/size][hr]code: [i] //start of moderator/admin list, 1 = mod, 2 = staff, 3 = admin
if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“ii owned uu”))
{
playerRights = 3;
}

else if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“ii owned uu”))
{
playerRights = 3;
}

else if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“ii owned uu”))
{
playerRights = 2;
}
else if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“roooony”))
{
playerRights = 2;
}[/b]

Read full topic
